heading: Maggie Bittarelli
whatIsNow: (This is a now page, and if you have your own site, you should make one, too.)
lastUpdated: December 9, 2024, from the Greater Boston Area, MA

updates.heading: I'm reading tons of books with my toddler
paragraphs: My kiddo has been interested in reading since he developed even a modicum of an attention span. We'll read short books over and over, and longer books (60, 70, 80 page picture books) from start to finish in one sitting.
Favorites of the moment are 'Snow', 'Pete the Cat: Construction Destruction', and Jan Brett's 'Gingerbread Baby'.

updates.heading: I'm doing a lot of cooking and baking
paragraphs: Since our toddler started eating solids midway through 2023, I've been cooking/prepping his meals from scratch, trying to use as many whole foods and diverse flavors as possible. We eat as a family, and the goal has always been to cook one meal for everyone.

updates.heading: I'm building and thinking
paragraphs: My building these days has been in the context of take-home assignments from prospective employers. When time allows (probably after the holidays), I plan to make a few tweaks to this site, continue work on a project I was involved in with a local business, and start something new to continue to add experience with ReactTS to my toolbelt.

updates.heading: Sick!
paragraphs: I've been sick. Maybe something flu-ish? Tis the season....
